alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 6:59AM CST until January 12 at 7:30AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHICOT...SUNFLOWER...WASHINGTON AND SOUTHEASTERN BOLIVAR COUNTIES... At 658 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Boyle to near Wayside, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Greenville, Cleveland, Leland, Ruleville, Shaw, Boyle, and Holly Ridge around 705 AM CST. Drew, Doddsville, and Tribbett around 710 AM CST. Indianola, Sunflower, and Blaine around 715 AM CST. Moorhead around 725 AM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas...and central, north central, northwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
